definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 1:14 bag, purse (perh. kindred with [[כּוֹס]], q.v.; Ar. kiysun (prob. fr. Pers. kiysah;un Lane:2640); Eth. kisa: NH [[כִּיס]]; Aram. [[כִּיסָא]], kiyso0 Plam. [[מן כיסה]] from his purse = at his own expense, Vog:p. 13 al.)—bag, in which were carried:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: money, i.e. a purse Is 46:6, Pr 1:14.
